title: Semantic Relations
description: Schema for expressing arbitrary, semantic relationships for a product, analogous to RDF triples (dev.ocp.product.semantic_relations@1.0).

items.description: A single statement about the product (the implicit subject).

predicate.description: The relationship type, expressed as a URI from a well-known vocabulary (e.g., schema.org, Dublin Core, custom).

object.description: The target of the relationship, which can be a literal value or another resource.

type.description: Specifies if the object is a resource (identified by a URI) or a simple value.

value.description: The URI of the resource or the literal string value.

datatype.description: For literals, the XSD datatype URI (e.g., 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#date').

lang.description: For string literals, the BCP 47 language tag (e.g., 'en', 'fr-CA').
